prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that has vibrant green colors and a playful demeanor.
Generate a small, caterpillar-like creature with unique pink antennae and a friendly expression.
Design an adorable Pokemon with a round body and large eyes, primarily in shades of green.

Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a caterpillar, with a yellow and green color scheme.
